mapper.select: select t.id, t.parent_id, t.name as title, t.id as `key` from cms_site t where t.status = '${@com.easy.admin.common.core.common.status.CommonStatus@ENABLE.code}' order by t.order_no
select t.id, t.parent_id, t.name, t.keyword, t.description, t.domain_name, t.deployment_path, t.status, t.theme from cms_site t where t.status = #{status}

select t.name, t.keyword, t.description, t.domain_name, t.deployment_path, t.theme, sd_status.name as status, t.order_no from cms_site t left join sys_dict sd_status on sd_status.code = t.status and sd_status.dict_type = 'commonStatus'
